languages.text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.
languages.original_text: При использовании средней брони шанс уклонения уменьшается на 25%, а при использовании тяжелой — на 50%. Для успешного уклонения от атак лучше подходит легкая броня.

traits.locale_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.
Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.
Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.

languages.text: La armadura media reduce la probabilidad de esquiva de su portador en un 25 %, y la pesada, en un 50 %. Si quieres esquivar ataques, usa armadura ligera.
languages.original_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.

traits.locale_text: La armadura media reduce la probabilidad de esquiva de su portador en un 25 %, y la pesada, en un 50 %. Si quieres esquivar ataques, usa armadura ligera.

languages.text: 中型护甲会使装备者的闪避率降低25%，而重型护甲会降低50%。如果您想闪避敌人的攻击，请装备轻型护甲。
languages.original_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.

traits.locale_text: 中型护甲会使装备者的闪避率降低25%，而重型护甲会降低50%。如果您想闪避敌人的攻击，请装备轻型护甲。

languages.text: ミディアムアーマーは着用者の回避率を25%減少させ、ヘビーアーマーは50%減少させる。敵の攻撃をかわしたい場合はライトアーマーを着用しよう。
languages.original_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.

traits.locale_text: ミディアムアーマーは着用者の回避率を25%減少させ、ヘビーアーマーは50%減少させる。敵の攻撃をかわしたい場合はライトアーマーを着用しよう。

languages.text: Mittelschwere Rüstung reduziert die Ausweichchance ihres Trägers um 25 %, schwere Rüstung um 50 %. Trage leichte Rüstung, wenn du in der Lage sein willst, gegnerischen Angriffen auszuweichen.
languages.original_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.

traits.locale_text: Mittelschwere Rüstung reduziert die Ausweichchance ihres Trägers um 25%, schwere Rüstung um 50%. Trage leichte Rüstung, wenn du in der Lage sein willst, gegnerischen Angriffen auszuweichen.

languages.text: Une armure moyenne réduit les chances d'esquive du personnage qui la porte de 25 %, tandis qu'une armure lourde les réduit de 50 %. Pour pouvoir esquiver les attaques ennemies, choisissez plutôt une armure légère.
languages.original_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.

traits.locale_text: Une armure moyenne réduit les chances d'esquive du personnage qui la porte de 25 %, tandis qu'une armure lourde les réduit de 50 %. Pour pouvoir esquiver les attaques ennemies, choisissez plutôt une armure légère.

languages.text: При использовании средней брони шанс уклонения уменьшается на 25%, а при использовании тяжелой — на 50%. Для успешного уклонения от атак лучше подходит легкая броня.

languages.text: Orta düzey zırh, giyen kişinin kaçınma olasılığını %25 azaltırken ağır zırh ise %50 düşürür. Düşman saldırılarından kaçınabilmek istiyorsan hafif zırh giy.
languages.original_text: Medium armour reduces the dodge chance of its wearer by 25% while heavy armour reduces it by 50%. Wear light armour if you want to be able to dodge enemy attacks.
